name: elegant cotton doily
notes:
crochet elegant cotton doily - in days gone by doilies used to be crocheted more in fine delicate yarns, these days they can be made in thicker cottons etc and have a variety of uses. hope you enjoy making this one!

the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats, written in english.

**please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog [www.crochetncreate.com][1]**

finished size approx:- 11 inch diameter

level: intermediate
